website_summaries.verdict: One of the highest-rated sun hats available, this protective product offers supreme coverage for children of all sizes.
pros: Sides include mesh fabric for ventilation
Offers full protection for back of neck
Material is water repellent and stain resistant
cons: A few customers had trouble figuring out the correct size

customer_reviews.title: Protected
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hat! Great fit and coverage! I have been wanting my daughter to wear a hat along with sunscreen when we go to the park or pool, etc but they have been heavy or not proper fit, etc..but this one is lightweight, adjustable, water resistant, smart strap, upf 50+ and cute. I would definitely recommend it. Oh and I ordered a medium size for my 3 1/2 Yr old girl in case it helps anyone. It's a perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: Acid Cannibal

customer_reviews.title: THIS HAT IS AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: This hat is PERFECT!! My son is 3 years old and has a fairly large head. It fit good especially with the strap in the back that you can adjust. I wish it came down a little farther but overall it's AMAZING! The wide brim shades his face, the mesh keeps him cool and the back flap protects his neck. We were at the beach all day and I felt confident that he wasn't going to get burned. (I of course applied sunscreen as well) I was a little hesitant at first bc of the price but I'm telling you...WORTH EVERY PENNY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Shipped poorly, arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: I love the hat, but unfortunately it was shipped folded in half so there seems to be a permanent fold in the brim which makes it somewhat floppy and useless. I ordered the size L for my 4.5 year old daughter and the fit is great (originally ordered size M but it was too small). She also loves the pink/purple flower pattern. Seems well made and designed. Just wish they had shipped it properly.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Cute, functional, and comfy
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves her new hat! We even switched hats as a joke one morning, and her hat expanded to fit me. We bought the Youth Large for 5-12 year olds in the pretty purple and pink floral pattern (her choice), and she has received complements from her friends and their parents. Seems durable and blocks out the sun really well. I love how their are two adjustable straps - one under the chin, and one at the back of the head. I foresee her being able to wear this for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: No ventilation for baby's head-very sweaty!
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased all three sizes: baby, child and youth due to the fantastic brim and neck flap coverage but I am disappointed that the baby version has no ventilation on the head. Given that this is made of an entirely synthetic fabric that doesn't work for us and our sweaty baby during these hot summer days. I love that the larger sizes have ventilation panels so the head can breathe, however if you have a baby you are trying to keep cool, I do not recommend this hat.
customer_reviews.author: TheBabyEdit

customer_reviews.title: 5th one I buy, always happy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 5 of these hats in 7 years for my kids, and they all were perfect. The security hooks used to be easier to break, now they have been improved. The design, the adjustable parts and the manufacturing quality are great. I have washed the hats several times and they are still ok. I just wish the hat would be more compactable / foldable and easier to carry in bags, without damaging the front too easily.
customer_reviews.author: JulieT

customer_reviews.title: Nice shade for my kid
customer_reviews.text: I love the hat. It covers all the way to her neck, gives her enough coverage when playing. She loves it too but the cord can be a bit annoying coz it's long and just hanging there. I would buy it again. I took some of the stars off because I did the laundry and the color came off and went on so many clothes. And I couldn't get rid off it. So there's that. If you wanna do laundry for it, just separate the hat.
customer_reviews.author: Mint

customer_reviews.title: Best sun hat!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this one for my 16 month old niece (Size: Small Color: Purple Arrow/Iris). This is the best hat we have ever purchase for her. Very light, fits perfectly (you can adjust from back), big enough to protect a face and back of a neck. Only cons- In the video and description it says it has "Breathable Mesh Panels" - that why i purchase because we live in Sac. even though love the Pink Fossil a lot. But the hat arrived with breathable panels on it.. I was little disappointed at first.. but no regrets after all.. it is so light and we are using it everything we take her out.
customer_reviews.author: Sonamphuntsok

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! You won’t regret
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat! 1.bright colors easy to spot on the beach. 2. They are comfortable and breathable so kids keep on! 3. Wide brim and back shade are perfect for long days on the boat, beach or zoo! 4. Wash up and maintain really well. We have had same hat for almost 2 years. 5. Travel well. Stick in travel case, diaper bag or whatever and they won’t lose their shape or function. We loved our kids hats we ended up buying the adult version! Buy it they are awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Small = No Mesh! Babies Get Hot Too!
customer_reviews.text: We have this hat in a medium for my older daughter and it is the most amazing hat. It had the mesh air panel, which allows for air flow. It provides fantastic sun coverage. She’s worn it constantly (including in the pool!) for two years and it still looks amazing. So of course I wanted one for our little guy. Unfortunately the small size is not available with the mesh panel. What??? Babies/toddlers get hot too! Hot babies don’t want to wear hats! I’ve always been a big proponent of coverage v sunscreen. I’m considering buying my own mesh and having a panel added. Sigh. Please fix!
customer_reviews.author: gc

customer_reviews.title: We have several of these
customer_reviews.text: Each of my children has one of these hats. We live in the desert so sun hats are essential daily wear. We get compliments on them everywhere we go. They are super lightweight but very protecting. Easy to roll up into a tight roll that fits into the diaper bag/purse without taking up much space. I love the cinch strap in the back to get a secure fit on the head. I took away one star because the plastic chin clasp is flimsy and bends out of shape easily. My 16 month-old can pull it apart.
customer_reviews.author: LSU

customer_reviews.title: OK. Not quite as great as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a sun hat that could get wet and still keep the sun out, without falling into my son's face. This does that. However, it's not very convenient to pack/carry. It doesn't really fold up very well, so to try to stick it in my purse is impossible. And if the brim gets bent, it's hard to un-bend it. Plus, the big brim flips up a lot. Not a big deal, just defeats the purpose if the sun is on his face. I like this hat better than my old sun hat, but I wouldn't buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Trillium03

customer_reviews.title: I love these Hats!
customer_reviews.text: I love these hats. They are worth the price, especially if they are on sale. I always go with the Child size although the sizing chart says to go smaller. I like the larger sun protection and they can be easily sinched down. We are in the sun year around, with s few months of harsh sun. These hats keep my kids protected. My kids wear these hats everywhere. They are good quality, adjustable, and have a break away strap. The only problem is that we loose one every year!
customer_reviews.author: Violet E.

customer_reviews.title: Best sunhat ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sunhat! This is our 2nd hat because the first one got lost on an adventure after about a year into using it. Durable, comfortable, and talk about full coverage for the sun! Brim doesn't flop down if it gets wet and fabric on back protects neck when explorers are examining all the interesting things on the ground! Also holds shape well despite being crammed into various bags and strollers. Vibrant colors make them easy to pick out of a crowd. Worth every penny and then some.
customer_reviews.author: White Owl

customer_reviews.title: A hat my kiddos actually kept on their heads!
customer_reviews.text: These hats were the best investment we could have made for our beach trip. My girls are the first ones to take off their baseball hats wherever we go. I wondered just how long they would leave these hats on. I was so surprised that they left them on the entire time they were out in the sun! They even left them on while swimming in the ocean. They are great quality! They are super light, breathable, soft, and comfy. I wish I would have had one for myself! I ordered a medium for my 4 year old and a large for my 8 year old. They fit them perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Best hat ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my son’s second version of this hat. At 18m, we purchased him the Medium size. While it still fits his head (at five years old), the brim is now too narrow and the hat no longer provides enough shade. I purchased him the L and it’s great. We love the light khaki color because it’s cool and goes with everything. These are worn on the boat, in the pool, at the beach- everywhere. They’ve never faded or shown any wear. These hats are amazing for SC heat and sun!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine B.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great hat! I have a large 3 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: We have been buying Sunday Afternoons Hats for our whole family for YEARS! This is a great hat! I have a large 3 year old - his head was right at the line between the 2 sizes and I opted for the Youth large and it was a great fit! The adjustable strap makes it almost impossible to go wrong with size and this will grow with him into next summer and beyond I'm sure! The quality is excellent! I expect this to wear just as well as my own hats and my husbands hats that are years old now! Thanks Sunday afternoons! You are the BEST!!! P.S. Really cute arrow pattern too! :)
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Cute and very functional hat!
customer_reviews.text: This hat is really cute! It gives great sun coverage and the chin strap helps keep the hat from blowing off. The safety clip release is a great feature to keep kids from being chocked by the hat strap. The material flap in the back seemed like a lot and too extra (at first) but it really has been perfect protection during this summer heat. My daughter wears it everyday, it’s light and drys fast after getting wet. The shape has held up well and the color and softness are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: AMom

customer_reviews.title: NOT as depicted.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a little irritated by this purchase. I’ve attached a picture of what I ordered and a picture of what I received.... come on now... those aren’t the same thing. I’ve also attached a picture of the tag on the hat that states “strategic crown ventilation”. Is that referring to the mesh that is clearly missing? If the product is different for the smaller sizes then they need to make a different listing with a different picture and tags for the product. Instead, I received something completely different than what I ordered. I purchased this product BECAUSE it had the ventilation and my baby has a ton of hair that will get sweaty if not ventilated.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S. Beck

customer_reviews.title: The best hats for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: We love these hats! This is the second one I have bought for my son so we can have an extra to take to school, etc. This is the only hat my son will wear for any great length of time. We live in a hot sunny climate and my son is super fair skinned so I'm glad to find a hat that he is comfortable wearing for long periods. I like that it has the adjustable chin strap since we often get strong winds. It also has a safety release so i don't have to worry about him getting strangled by it accidentally. My child is 2 1/2 and we bought the child size.
customer_reviews.author: Jena

customer_reviews.title: I can honestly say this is the best hat possible for sun protection
customer_reviews.text: After a full summer of wear, I can honestly say this is the best hat possible for sun protection , of your child. The brim stays up, even when wet and is large enough to actually shade their face snd neck. The hat is adjustible so we will have at least 2 years of wear out if it. The side mesh keeps my daughter from sweating. It has the breakaway strap for safety. I have gotten many compliments, i cant recomend highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: m.sou

customer_reviews.title: Great hat, but major fabrication error
customer_reviews.text: This hat is beautiful. It looks so amazing on my 2 yo. Daughter. However, due to a fabrication error the sench in the back would not stay closed. I found this exact hat at REI and it had the same problem. The sench mechanism was installed backwards sp it wouldn't self tighten.thus it always fell off my child's head because it was not tight enough. Solution? I had to stitch the sench at the best place for my daughters current head size, as she grows I will just have to remove and replace the stich. Unnecessary work.
customer_reviews.author: ahill

customer_reviews.title: Well worth investing in this sun hat
customer_reviews.text: Such a great hat to have for a toddler. their products are top-notch in construction and well thought out for functional features. Provides excellent sun protection, the visor stays up on like another hat where it was floppy and would fall into his face when wet. I also love the safety rip away chin strap in case he gets caught on something so he doesn't get strangulated. Thank you for such a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breathable, lightweight and great coverage!
customer_reviews.text: Instantly upon opening I knew this was a good buy; the material is light and breathable and the back portion covers a significant amount of the upper back area. I don’t think I will have to apply sunscreen to the face/back of neck any longer! As a plus, it is super super cute 😊 My daughter loves the butterflies 🦋
customer_reviews.author: pinkdots

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best toddler and baby hat on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best toddler and baby hat on the market. I love that is adjustable to your baby's head, making it much less like to slip off. The front bill is generously sized and easily blocks sun from the baby's face, but it is not obtrusive. The soft back panel covers the neck and upper back perfectly. Cleans up really easily and has held up in like new condition after a whole summer of daily wear. A must have!!!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Not Stewart

customer_reviews.title: I like it so much that I bought one for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hat for my 4 year old son, it fit perfectly, stays on his head (adjustable head band and chin strap), and protects him from the Texas summer sun. It works well in wet or dry conditions. We took it to the beach for 2 weeks and it protected him well there. He hates to have sunscreen put on his face so I give him the option of "Wear your hat, or I will need to put sunscreen on your face." He always picks this hat. I like it so much that I bought one for my 1.5 year old daughter and I even bought one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: gradstudent11

customer_reviews.title: Customer service
customer_reviews.text: As a grandparent this is my fifth purchase we love the grandbabies hats with the exception of one!! The strap broke purchased in 2019 the others same hat they are almost 6 years old going strong! My husband has one on the way for Father’s Day. And they do stand behind the lifetime guarantee!!!!! Awesome, and that is all thanks to one Erin customer service rep. FYI she should be in charge she’s awesome. Replacement on the way, thanks again😇
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Best Hats Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought a pair for our kids when they were toddlers and loved it so much we bought another pair as they got older, currently 7 and 9.5yo. I gave my son's old one to my 2yo niece and my sister said it's the only hat she doesn't rip off her head. The colors are vibrant, and they are great for travel. Will continue to buy for my kids as their heads grow, and as long as they are willing to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: JBN

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this today and wore it all day outside and it is a great hat (so far) . It covers her face and neck very well and is absolutely adorable on. I went with the medium even though she is only just about 2 she has a HUGE head. It fits and because of the adjusting strap and there is plenty of room for her to grow ! I'm very happy with this purchase. Its a bit pricey but honestly worth it. I'm debating on buying another (:
customer_reviews.author: ISpendTooMuchOnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Love it, works great to keep sun off the neck.
customer_reviews.text: We call this the mullet hat! :) It fits big which I think is great, I hope to use it for many years. I know the style is a bit dorky with the neck cover, but it keeps the son off my sons neck. Before we bought this hat he got sunburn on the back of his neck from playing too long in the sun and this made all the difference. He can stay outside longer now and he keeps the hat on. The chin strap is quick release, but he mostly leaves it alone. The hat is also adjustable in the back so it should grow with him for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Best sun hat EVER.
customer_reviews.text: We now own 5 of these hats! Our older kids have had theirs for over 5 years, and we’ve traveled across the US and Africa with them. Adjustable and comfortable! Even our daughter with special needs can wear hers in a wheelchair. They wash easily and well, and they look like new even after years of use. I recommend them all the time! If they didn’t look a bit silly, I’d wear one, too (although I own two hats by the same brand)!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hat, great color and quality, great company for return
customer_reviews.text: Great quality hat so gave it full stars but didn't work for my 12 month old. Hat was sadly to small. Beautiful color. My 12 month old is at the top of the American charts for height weight and head circumference, so might just be our issue, might work for a normal size 6 to 24 month old babies head... Was to snug for my big headed guy, we returned. Great company. Easy return label, fast refund.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Can easily adjust for years. Best purchase!
customer_reviews.text: So worth the money! I bought an infant 0-6mo for my two yr old and a Baby 6-24mo for my three year old. In 2014! They are 8&9 yrs old and and THEY CAN STILL WEAR THEM! They have withstood living in the Caribbean for five years and many many beach trips. My kids don’t mind wearing them and we’ve kept adjusting the strap in the back as they grew. This might be the last year they wear them tho haha. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ladylaura

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two Medium size hats for my thirty pound two year old and thirty pound three year old. These hats provide excellent coverage for their face, shoulders and back.( I still use sunscreen because we are outside playing in the sun every day.) These hats hold their shape well even when wet. We have been using them at the splash pad. The brims do not flip down when wet. I'm so happy with them I am ordering an adult size for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: LaD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: After bought a couple of hats we now persist on this brand. 1. Hard brim, so windy days it still covers the face. 2. Safety lock. I thought this one doesn't have the safety lock like the baby version but it has it right above the ear. So the lock would break and string would break up it is pulled so it is very safe for kids! Of course you can relock it. 3. Protect necks.
customer_reviews.author: lydia

customer_reviews.title: I would give 10 stars if I could
customer_reviews.text: My skin is extremely white and pasty, and my son inherited my skin tone. This hat has amazing coverage and even offers some protection on shoulders, mid-back and upper arms since he’s only 1yr old. If he’s distracted at beach or outside he doesn’t notice hat is on (immediately pulls off other hats). I specifically made sure to come back and review. This hat is. The. Best.
customer_reviews.author: Erica A

customer_reviews.title: This is the hat your kid needs!
customer_reviews.text: These hats are fantastic for my active family! My kids are very fair skinned and have never had a sun burn, and I’m trying my best to keep it that way! These hats last all day on their heads! The are in and out of the pool for hours on end and it never flops in their face. My father was so impressed with the durability that he ordered an adult version! I will probably do the same for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: great hat for the sun
customer_reviews.text: this is our go-to hat when it's sunny and/or hot. it appears to breath pretty well and protects the head and (perhaps just as importantly!) the neck of our son. he's a red head so he needs all the sun protection he can get! the fit is easy to adjust and the strap around the chin is a nice addition. it can be detached but won't just come apart when pulled on. recommended.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Protective and quick drying
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for trip to Florida. Both adjustable feature in back and adjustable chin strip keep hat secure. Uses in the pool and on the beach. Got it wet and dried very quickly. Other moms with young children asked where we got it and ordered on the spot to the hotel we were staying at for use on their vacations. Got the small play hat for 6 month old and anticipate it will fit for at least a year of use. Baby size would have been too small.
customer_reviews.author: rebekah kohn

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My baby is very fair and burns after just moments in direct sunlight. This hat adjusted perfectly to fit him at 6 months, and will adjust to toddler age. The wide brim and back flap provide full protection for his face, neck and shoulders. It is easy to wipe clean. Haven't washed it yet, but it is very sturdy material. The strap is well made with a good quality plastic buckle. It adjusts for size with the chin strap and with another strap/buckle at the back of the hat for head size.
customer_reviews.author: I. Thorpe

customer_reviews.title: Extra protection for the back of the neck
customer_reviews.text: Lots to like about this kids sun hat. - It has an extra wide rim all round and extra length at the back to protect the neck. - The front of the rim can be popped up to improve visibility, if desired. - The under chin strap has a safety release that pops open when the cord taught (designed to prevent injuries if the cord was to become caught on something). - Ventilated panels in the side of the hat help to keep kids cool in hot weather.
customer_reviews.author: Tori P.

customer_reviews.title: Great hat with stiff brim and adjustability
customer_reviews.text: Really great hat! My daughter is 1 and wore it for the first time. The adjustability is awesome. She has it as tight as it will go, so I'm sure she will grow into it nicely. The brim is the perfect stiffness. It doesn't flop into her face even when wet. For some reason the one I ordered didnt come with the vent on the side. It seemed to be cool enough for her, but will have to try it again.
customer_reviews.author: Erica M.

customer_reviews.title: 😒😒😒
customer_reviews.text: I just got my hat 👒 I bought it in pink and purple.But my hat doesn't look like the hat in the picture. It Supposed to have some air vent relations and each side of the hat which mine doesn't have.I Want the hat that I was supposed to get or my money 💰 back.😔I mean the hat is not bad but if your a s S specific color a shape or whatever you're supposed to get what your pain for not something that you didn't order.
customer_reviews.author: Boris R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Lots of coverage . Well made
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6 years old . I did measure his head as instructed and he is 21 inches . I ordered a large . It fits perfect . With room to tighten so the water won’t wash it away . It’s so comfortable and so well made . It even has room for him to grow into it. I ordered one for my 3 yr old too. Medium . Also fits perfect and there’s lots of sun protection. I would definitely order More if needed as they grow or as gifts . Great buy
customer_reviews.author: victoria c

customer_reviews.title: Best hats for kids ever!
customer_reviews.text: BEST. HATS. EVER! I have had so many parents come up to me and say: "where did you get those hats for your kids????" These are the best. They stay on the kids' heads, they are breathable, they shade the face and the back of the neck, they are light weight, they can be crushed in a suitcase and they retain their shape! I can't say enough good things about these! Best purchase for a kid you can make. I have used them for years and they barely wear out. I have an extra one because we thought we lost one at one point and I tried several other hats, but I only love these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Farber

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Protection!
customer_reviews.text: These hats are pricy but definitely worth of the cost. The large brims provides excellent coverage from the sun. The adjustable straps are comfortable and easy to use. My kids love them because they don’t get hot in them thanks to the breathable mesh on the sides. I ordered large for my 6 and 5 years old and they are just perfect and lots of room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: The BEST kids hat!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely my favorite hat for kids. Both my boys have these, at 1 and 5. They are wide enough that their faces and necks are completely covered, but the brim is flexible so I can roll it up and fit it in my back pocket if we go indoors. The size adjustment has meant one hat fits both my 1 year old starting from about 6 months on to my 5 year old. These are also breathable, which is great, and their unique design makes it easy to see my kids when they're playing in a sea of others. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessika Whiteside

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured... terrible packing.
customer_reviews.text: I’m rather disappointed to get this item and see it look NOTHING like the picture. I’m not sure if it is a fake version of this brand or a different style, but definitely not what is pictured. There is not slide adjustable chin strap. It is a easy pull snap that my 1 year old will rip right off. There are also no side vents. Also packing was terrible. There was a crease through the center of the front brim. All around a disappointing purchase from amazon. The hat I did get aside from the terrible packing and different from picture is nice, but not what I want.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the hat! My child has a large head so I just went ahead and ordered the largest size so it will fit the longest. I cinch it up right now and it fits perfect! Covers all his skin on his head and neck. The lifesaver is the chin strap! My kid tried to pull the hat off as soon as it was on, but having that chin strap stopped him from removing it! He gave up and just wore it! Absolutely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Smith

customer_reviews.title: No saggy brim here! Great hat!
customer_reviews.text: This hat was great! My three year old son loved this hat and wore it all day at the beach and the pool with no issues. He never tried to take it off which is amazing. It's light weight, breathable, but offered great protection to his face and neck. The brim was frequently soaked and never drooped which is hard to find. The hat held it's shape in the suitcase - I packed it flat. The pictures were confusing so I wasn't sure which strap I was getting. It turned out to be the strap with the buckle and not the drawstring which thankfully turned out to be fine.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one in size 2-4T for my almost 4 year old son first and tried it on my 1 and 1/2 year old son. It fit both of them so i bought another one same size for the little guy. The material is waterproof and dries out quickly. My sister and i love them and want to buy big size for us. I bought a best rated sun hat for my son before but i hated how soft the front brim was. It covered his eyes when the wind blew. I highly recommend this hat
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Caputo

customer_reviews.title: Great adjustable size and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the baby size instead of the infant since my child's head was right between the largest setting of the infant and the smallest of the baby. This worked out great on the smallest setting, especially since the chin strap adjusts easily. I love that the chin strap has a clip instead of velcro. Great coverage and really lightweight. When in a rainstorm the water beaded up on the fabric so baby didn't get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: After buying these hats i would never consider any other. These are simply the best. They cover the most and the brim stays in place but isn't too stiff. They are also very adjustable. I bought the medium size for my 2year old and my 4 year old and seems like they will both get years of wear out of them. Every thing you could want from a sun hat.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BREAK away strap really does mean broken
customer_reviews.text: I owned this hat for approximately 3 seconds. Never made it outside. When I saw on the video that there was a breakaway strap feature for safety, I assumed there would be a way to put the strap back on. Nope. My 15-month old pulled the strap right off the hat before I even fully got the hat on him. Waste of $26.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: We have purchased 4 of these hats over the last ...
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased 4 of these hats over the last 4 years in different sizes for our two boys. Both have red hair and fair skin so sun protection is a must. The hats are lightweight and not too intrusive. The adjustable strap should allow for a couple years of use before they grow out of them. They are very breathable so they don't get too hot wearing them in summer. The unstructured back of the brim lays down on the neck for full coverage no matter what they are doing. All four of the hats have held up really well to two kids under 5, lots of outdoor play and plenty of washes.
customer_reviews.author: CubFan

customer_reviews.title: Tons of compliments
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one for my 6 year old and one for my 4 year old with an abnormally large head. I bought larges for both and the hats are great. The coverage is fantastic and all the features like the non-floppy front and the safety strap are high quality. I've even washed them in the machine with no problems. We live on a Caribbean island and spend lots of time in brutal sun and these hats have been fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great design, not so great material.
customer_reviews.text: Love the style of this hat, but not a fan of the material. Its 100% polyester and will make the kids head sweat. There are no vents in the infant size we ordered. Maybe they could have put some holes at least or made it out of a breathable material for better ventilation. I still rate it 4 stars because the style is unbeatable. The hard brim in the front ensures it's not flopping in front of your kids eyes, and the soft flap in the back allows them to comfortably sit back in the stroller and provide sun protection on their neck. Another great feature is the adjustable strap in the back so it can grow with your kid.
customer_reviews.author: Rosy M

customer_reviews.title: Best Sun Hat!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Fits really well (there’s a band on the back that allows you to tighten it to a comfortable fit) and the string under the chin comes undone when pulled on it (so it won’t “strangle” your kid if it gets stuck on something). Also super lightweight and breathable. I also love that it covers the neck too.
customer_reviews.author: Camila Ramires Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Durable with good sun coverage.
customer_reviews.text: Buy it! Bought a medium for my 2 year old son. He is about to turn 5 and I’m buying a large for him. The medium would still work for another 6 months ( though it looks a tad small to me, it fits fine) but his younger sister has been wearing it. She’s 16 months and the medium fits her though I do have to tighten the back strap to keep it on her head. Both kids are in the 50% height/weight for their age. Has held up well with moderate use over the last 3 years. Like the neutral color. Great sun coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J Swainston

customer_reviews.title: Best sun hat on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 5-12 year, size large. It fits everyone from my soon the be four year old to me...the cinch in the back is genius! Love the floppy Val: kids can lay back against strollers, car seats, lounge chairs, etc. Love the material, comfortable when wet and dries quickly. The last sun hat you will ever need to buy your child.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Z.

customer_reviews.title: Your child needs this hat!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this hat!!!! I wish I bought this hat sooner. I purchased the large for my 2 year old (who could easily pass as 3) and it fits nicely. I can see this hat lasting for years!!! The sun protection and quality of the brim is fantastic- easily packed yet does not lose its shape. Definitely worth the investment!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: All around useful
customer_reviews.text: The brim of the hat is firm, not flimsy. So you dont havetl to worry about it falling in your face. It can also be flipped up like a baseball cap. The sides and the back am offer great skin protection and coverage. The material is also a nice soft smooth texture so no problems with it irritating skin.
customer_reviews.author: Hamuel Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Went back for number two!
customer_reviews.text: After ordering one for my three year old and having her try it out I realized I needed one for my one year old. Nothing does the job quit like this hat. Both girls struggle to keep hats on. Not an issue with this hat. It is comfortable enough neither child complains. It’s also extremely adjustable. I got a size med for both children despite a 2.5 year age difference. We’ll be wearing these all summer to protect from sun and bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Buy this hat for your kids!
customer_reviews.text: We spend out summers out in the hot desert lakes (CO River). I have bought this hat for each of my kids, buying the bigger sizes as they grow! I recommend this hat to everyone with kids! It his a large brim to protect their faces, that also holds its shape when wet. It is a light material to keep their head cool and the strap under the chin keeps the hat on while underway on the boat!
customer_reviews.author: NorrisFamily

customer_reviews.title: Fits!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small woman's head and many adult hats overwhelm me. I decided to try this youth hat and am very pleased. It is well made, will pack well and can't wait to wear it on the safari trip I have planned next year. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Third one we've purchased, currently the best toddler sun hat on the market
customer_reviews.text: Third one we've purchased and I love this hat for our growing child. Only reason it did not get 5 stars is because of the lack of colors and print/patterns available and also because the fabrication feels stiffer than the previous (smaller) size we've purchased (and loved). They could also improve the design by making more air ventilation around the head for sweaty running toddlers. Otherwise, highly recommend it! Love the quick release cord, full coverage of a wide brim and neck/back flap.
customer_reviews.author: TheBabyEdit

customer_reviews.title: Best designed sun hat
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand for sun hat. My child loses his sun hat frequently. I hage tried buying other cheaper brand and i am bow convinced this is among the best designed and blockage of sunlight which my child is willing to wear consistently. The light weight material, ventilation, and curve allows for him to feel comfortably and play freely without being disturbed by what’s on his head that makes this such a great hat! I now shop exclusive for this brand of sun hat and will push the envelop for “boy” color hat with what is on sale.
customer_reviews.author: quynh pham

customer_reviews.title: PLASTIC material for summer ???!
customer_reviews.text: Design is good to give protection from sunlight but WHY Synthetic material for HOT Summer? Foolish idea. It MUST be organic cotton. Its very synthetic more than i expected. Its like plastic! And BTW NO harmful chemicals are required to "give protection" from sun ! Nowadays all swimwear and sun hats has these ! Plus the colors look better in pics i feel. Returned !
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Love the Sunday Afternoons Play Hat!
customer_reviews.text: Love these hats. I’ve purchased them for several years each time a child needs to go up a size and have purchased them as gifts, as well. I love these hats. Very durable for hard-playing littles. Stay on, wide brims, breathable, easy to clean, fun colors and patterns. Just love them.
customer_reviews.author: NR

customer_reviews.title: Great sunhat for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sun hat for toddlers. Because of the back adjustable strap, it will grow with your child. The brim is wide enough that it will cover your child's face while in direct sun. Also, the fabric is somewhat waterproof -- we put this hat on my toddler when we were on vacation and at the pool. The water beaded on the surface and so it didn't get sopping wet. It is lightweight, so its not heavy on your child's head like some cotton hats can be. It is also easy to pack as it can be folded without damaging the hat. All in all a great little sun hat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have sunhat for little ones.
customer_reviews.text: Best sunhat ever. Looks adorable on my 2.5 year old daughter and she loves it. It stays on really good and is comfortable. Love that it's also water repellent. It gives excellent protection on her face and neck. Wish there was a smaller size than 6 months so I could get one for my second daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Shazi

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, super safe!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints whatsoever. Great product. Super cute, super safe with the smart latch that just needs a firm tug to open, ensuring my daughter doesn’t get caught on anything. Love that it’s adjustable, I got a large, she’s 17 months but I wanted her to be able to wear it for a good long while as it is pricey. But it’s worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Flutterbydolly

customer_reviews.title: Came dirty
customer_reviews.text: The hat we received was clearly used, dirty, and returned. Tags were not even attached. There is a stain on the gray rim that I’ve tried to get out and can’t. Unfortunately, I needed this hat immediately and didn’t have time to return it for a new one. I am so disappointed. I washed it before we used it and it fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Earley

customer_reviews.title: The best sun hat for kids I've found
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these hats for my daughter years ago and she's still wearing it's the best sun hat around. So I bought one for my son and I love that it protects his neck. There's an adjustable band under his chin to keep on the hat and the bill stays put even in water it doesn't get floppy. The hard part is getting him to wear it. Maybe he'll change his mind when it's so sunny outside. I know my kids are protected from the sun when they wear these. They can even wear these hats in the pool and they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: six thumbs up from our household
customer_reviews.text: This hat is great for keeping a child's head and neck cooler in the summer sun. It's VERY nice quality. My daughter is required to have a sun hat at her preschool, as they spend approx 3 hours a day outside, and she was wearing another hat that had a large, floppy brim. One day she said that hat didn't work as well as her friend's and she requested the same hat, which turned out to be a Sunday Afternoons hat. She now loves the new hat and has inspired her father, who does fieldwork, to get his own.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Best kid summer hat
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand and I love this style. Covers the neck and keeps the kids cool. I got a size large as my kids (12 month old included) have huge noggins and I wanted some years out of them. They’re totally adjustable so it’s a little big on the baby but it works great! We get so many compliments! Well made, washable, smashable and they pop right back into shape, haven’t faded yet after 2 summers. I also love that the chin strap has a breakaway buckle so no one gets accidentally strangled...no one wants that. Well done Sunday Afternoon! 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shade, good quality will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: The best baby hat we try. The flap is wide enough that keep the entire baby face and shoulders off the sun. The strap intead of velcro is also great. Is have a fastener in the back of the head to adjust as baby grows. Seem very confortable my eight months don’t fuzz abput wearing it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke in less than a week
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a five star review had the strap not broken in less than a week. So frustrating! I’m thankful it at least didn’t break while we were on vacation. I’ll try to exchange the hat, and update the review if I have a better experience.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sun hat
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old daughter loves this sun hat. Most other hats she pulls off but this one she keeps on and never argues about wearing it. It is light weight, the draw string at the neck and adjustable back keep it on really well even in the wind, the brim is a nice size for keeping the sun off her face without actually flopping down into her face like some others do. Washes really nicely in cold water on delicate cycle/hang dry. And the color is so nice! Very happy with this product, would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 11 years old. He loves loves loves his hat. Hi chose that color. His brother who is 6 years inherited his first Sunday Afternoons Hat (sand color). We live in Quito-Ecuador, at the midle of our planet so we have equatorial sun always an we need protection! When he uses his hat, he doesn't need sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Lucila Aleida Donoso Gomez

customer_reviews.title: 1 week and it broke
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed! I really loved this hat and so did my son. However, we didn’t even have it a week, only a couple wears and the chin strap broke off without any serious tugging. I adjusted the straps so it was looser on his chin, next thing I know it’s dangling as he’s walking around. For how much money and all the good reviews I was hoping for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality But Comes Creased
customer_reviews.text: This hat is made very well with high quality materials and construction. But, like other reviewers have stated, mine came with the brim creased because of how it was folded by the packager. If I pay this much for a hat, I expect it to be packaged and shipped properly. It could easily have been folded in a way to keep the integrity of the brim. I'd read this could happen and took my chances anyway and I'm regretting it. I'll return this because I don't want to pay $30 for a hat that comes damaged.
customer_reviews.author: La Tennista

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these and really like how cool and light they are. And great sun coverage as well. I bought these for my granddaughters to hopefully protect them from the sun better than I was as a kid and better than I protected my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Meda.Lass

customer_reviews.title: The longer brim piece in the back provides great neck coverage and it’s bendable so it’s great for ...
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous hats!! Seriously get it right now. The longer brim piece in the back provides great neck coverage and it’s bendable so it’s great for stroller rides. It’s very thin and lightweight but stays on my daughter’s head because of the adjustable strip in the back. It’s also great because it has a chin strap that is easy to “break off” in a hurry if it gets caught on something. Great buy and will last for multiple years!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Cain

customer_reviews.title: Defective product!!
customer_reviews.text: Would NOT buy this hat from Amazon. When it was shipped, the bill of the hat was folded in such a way that it had a permanent crease in the middle. This was annoying but I could live with it. Within two months, the chin strap on the hat broke with normal use. The chin strap is key to keeping the hat on a toddler’s head. It happened just out of the return window. Now we are stuck with this defective hat.
customer_reviews.author: syh

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection
customer_reviews.text: These hats are awesome. We have had one for the last two years. It held up great after two years of living in Florida and going to the beach and pool a ton. It still blocks the sun perfectly after two years. Unfortunately, we lost it on our last trip. I’m so glad the same hat is still available!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Best sun hat for toddlers & little kids!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these hats! We’ve had four of them in the last 2 years. (1 was outgrown, 1 was lost). This is one of the few hats my kids will keep on their heads. They are lightweight and do not make my kids too hot when they wear them. These hats dry quickly if you get them wet. I really love the wide brim and the neck covering. Lots of sun protection. We receive a lot of compliments and requests about these hats. I can not recommend them enough!
customer_reviews.author: Anne K.

customer_reviews.title: Kids actually wear this one!
customer_reviews.text: With 3 little kids living in TX, we have tried lots of sun hats. These are the best and worth the price. Perfect for kids riding in backpacks, boat seats, strollers, and bike trailers. The most recent one we purchased has an improvement where the chinstrap is short w a slider to adjust. This is much better than the long strap w the toggle as the strap gets caught and then the safety buckle pops open. Sizing is very generous w lots of room to grow. There is a tab in the back to adjust. If you are between sizes I would order the larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful hat/ a bit expensive.
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderfully stylish hat. It is on the pricer side so I am hoping it will last for at least a year or so. Currently my baby is 9months old and it fits him barely like I wanted it to. He will grow into it is what I am figuring it. I had to use the smallest setting and tightest on the chin strap. But it fits and he can't remove it! My baby keeps on trying to remove all his other hats and he has lost some by just tossing them off the side of the stroller. The hat actually offers wonderful protection on the back as well. All in all, we love this hat so far!
customer_reviews.author: A fabulous shopperTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this hat for our toddler. It is a soft, durable material, the bill is sturdy but not stiff and protects the whole face, the back covers the neck, the strap around the crown of the head stays pulled tight, and the chin straps aren't annoying to her. Would highly recommend this to anyone. I wanted a second one to keep at preschool and tried a cheaper version of this hat (another brand) and returned it to purchase another Sunday Afternoons- it just wasn't as good.
customer_reviews.author: Doodles

customer_reviews.title: Broke after maybe 10 uses
customer_reviews.text: This hat provides incredible coverage and seems well made, but my 17 month old son pulled it off his head and the under chin strap completely broke off the hat (and I'm not talking about the part that's supposed to break away). Funny enough, the portion that's supposed to break away, stayed put. I'm very disappointed in this hat.
customer_reviews.author: Kindleme

customer_reviews.title: Really nice hat after 2 year of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hat 2 years ago, and still in great shape. I love this hat. I am actually looking for the order history to find it so i could order a bigger size for my son. My son is now 3 years old, this hat really cover the sun so he could enjoy the outdoor summer.
customer_reviews.author: zlbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sun hat!
customer_reviews.text: Bought “child” size for 18 month twins. Concerned the kids wouldn’t wear them at first but it was so lightweight and took away glare at the beach they quickly forgot they had them on! Love the vented material and it dries so quickly. They wore them on a boat, out at the zoo, pool and beach. Best investment.
customer_reviews.author: I Read Too Many Reviews B4 Buying

customer_reviews.title: Love this cute, waterproof hat!
customer_reviews.text: Cute hat. I love that it’s waterproof. It held up well with a week on the lake - in and out of the water. I was on the fence about buying it because of the price. I am glad I made this purchase and will recommend it to friends. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Momma

customer_reviews.title: Love these hats!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love these hats. They’re very cute. The iplay hats always lost integrity when they got wet... BUT these hats don’t!. The back is long and floppy so it protects the neck and also makes it easy for baby to wear it and fall asleep. I love the quick release strap. They adjust very easily so can be worn for a very long time! I sized up, because you can always tighten them to fit baby’s head. Also my kids have big heads lol
customer_reviews.author: S. Camren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and toddlers will WEAR them
customer_reviews.text: Love these hats- this is our second (smaller size for our 2 yr old) and fits my 3-yr old perfectly. Because it can adjust (both around the circumference of head and around chin) they don't grow our of them too fast and fit is always good. It's the only hat either of my toddlers will wear without taking off. Comfortable, breathable, great sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: This is the hat you're looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 15 month old daughter and it's amazing! Strap under chin and cinch being head keeps the hat from blowing off (or her from removing it!) It's comfortable, light weight, breathable, and covers so much of her neck, back and face. She has worn it for whole days outside in the sun without complaint and without sunburn. Plus it's cute 🙂 Love love love this hat!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Quality check??
customer_reviews.text: Received this item, my son tried it on, and the strap came right off. It separated from the brim of hat and has a frayed end. We literally had possession of the hat for less than 5 minutes before it broke. So disappointing since we’ve purchased the same hat in smaller sizes and those are still in great condition after 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: CP4

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This hat was the second from this brand bought. I loved the first one, and it lasted years! This new design has a safety release tab on the strap which broke the first time it was worn. Instead of the safety tab unsnapping the strap broke off of the tab. We're unable to reattach it. It's clearly cheaply designed and poorly made, and now this hat is useless. We're disappointed, and will no longer buy this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Geoeve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE these hats. The brims are perfect for keeping the sun off yet still allow our kids to see. They are cool and breathable. Neither of our kids mind wearing them and the chin straps and adjustable pull on top help keep them in place. We got the youth sizes but they still fit our 14 month old and our almost 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: J. Melia

product_meta.title: Sunday Afternoons Kids' Play Hat
product_meta.description: The Kids Play Hat is the best investment you can make in sun protective wear for your children or grandchildren! Kids love to wear them, and parents and grandparents love knowing their little ones are staying safely sun protected during their critical childhood years. The best-selling kids sun hat offers unique sun protective features making it a hit everywhere the sun shines. Featuring: 2.5" - 4" down sloping brim with floatable foam core (brim length depends on size). Full 5.5" neck veil for protecting back of neck. UPF 50+ certified sun rating (mesh vents not rated). Strategic mesh ventilation on Child and Youth sizes. Water repellent / stain resistant. Packs flat for travel. SmartStrap breakaway chinstrap technology. Stroller friendly wear ability. External sizing band for custom fit. Lightweight: 1.8 ounces. Sizes: Infant (up to 6 mo.), Baby (6-24 mo.), Child (2-5 years), Youth (5-9 years). Designed in the USA/Imported. Patent # 5,664,261. Please see that our Kids Play Hat are equipped with a "Safety Strap" system. This allows the chin strap to be "un-snapped" from one side of the hat. Note: There should be two plastic clips that clip into each other.
